name: Knoll Textiles wallet designed by Dorothy Cosonas, titled Sinclair in 'imperial'
description:
This wallet is made from a great Knoll Textiles fabric, designed by Dorothy Cosonas, titled Sinclair in 'imperial'.

Inner pockets are made from bicycle inner tube, saved from the landfill by a local bike shop and their flat tire customers.

Tiny tag on the outside reminds you to "live fast, ride slow."

Each wallet comes wrapped in tissue in a simple kraft paper box.

description:

Each wallet comes wrapped in tissue in a simple kraft paper box.

name: Maharam Kvadrat 100% wool wallet, bright royal blue
description:
Kvadrat, based in Denmark, is Europe's leading resource for contract textiles. With a shared philosophy of design and service excellence, Maharam and Kvadrat work in tandem to better serve the global design community.

This 100% wool wallet is designed to be super durable and functional, and is made from sustainable materials.

Interior has two pockets for vertical card storage and one pocket for horizontal. Pockets are made from recycled bicycle innertube, saved from the landfill by a local bike shop and its flat tire repairs. Opens to reveal a place for paper money storage.

Tiny tag on the exterior reminds you to "live fast, ride slow."

name: Light Green Branches, Cycling Cap in Knoll Textiles
description:
I recently came into a stash of very high end fabrics and have started eeking out hat by hat...this great cap is made from a springy light green medium weight fabric. It has a branching tree limb pattern woven into it, its not a print.
The underside of the cap is a twig colored cotton in a medium weight as well.
One size fits most, if you feel like you're an exception to the rule please just send me a message!

name: High Vis Lime Green Pillow, printed with hand drawn dog portraits
description:
Recently my love of dogs was reaffirmed with the loss of a dear friends pet. I decided to draw portraits of some of my favorite canines and make fabric from the prints.

For this great statement pillow, I've silkscreened the portraits in metallic green ink on a bright, lime green colored cotton. The front panels are backed by a second layer of white sateen for opaqueness, and the back panels are Black Cotton. A little internal tab of velcro secures the two overlapping back panels together.

Pillow case is removable and wash safe in cool water. Tumble dry low. 
Pillow insert is new, hypoallerginic poly fill. 
This listing is for one pillow (pillowcase and insert), measuring 18"x18".

name: Huge Yellow Barkcloth Hip Bag with Vintage Equestrian Fabric Lining
description:
Yeowzas! 
This bag is huge!
Made of a heavy yellow textural barkcloth and lined with vintage swimsuit fabric in a lovely red, white and blue equestrian print.
Double divided bags each have a red canvas pocked on front, and close with heavy duty, no messin around black zippers.
Red canvas pockets have asymmetrical zig zag stitching.
Back of the bag has three beltloops for securing it to yourself. Run your belt through or use this bag with another fanny pack or messenger bag for additional storage on the go.

Great for a day at work where you need tools handy but also need your hands free, or for an adventure on two wheels where you want to carry lots of stuff, but not a huge messenger bag.

name: Painted Maple and Quartz Crystal Necklace
description:
This modern necklace is made from handcut and panted silver maple wood, paired with two Quartz Crystal Points. 
The maple is painted with a cool toned pattern in blues and greys. 

Antiqued brass chain allows the focal point to hang quite low, falling below the busom but above the navel.

name: Evil Eye Cycling Cap in Natural Cotton Color
description:
Keep the negative away with your new cycling cap!

The Eye of Providence usually has masonic associations, but also has deep rooted mythology in earlier American culture. Always regarded as a bringer of prosperity, the eye is rumored to ward off negative energy and bad juju.

Side panels each depict a hand with an eye in the center, shooting lightning toward the center panel of the cap, which has a hot pink eye atop a pyramid.

Hands are gold metallic ink. Brim is built with structural foam....not rigid plastic but not floppy. Also not cardboard.

Elastic band in the back makes this hat very universal in size, but if you feel like you have an exceptional head just send me a message and I'll measure for you.

Each panel is printed in my studio before assembly, so design may *very slightly* differ between hats, but the general layout is the same.

Two eyes shooting lightning are printed under the brim of the hat, streets are watchin', son!

Little tag in the back reminds you to live fast, ride slow.

Cool water wash, don't put that thing in the dryer, man!

name: Green Canvas Hip Bag with Many Pockets, Inside and Out
description:
I love this bag. 

Made from olive green outdoor canvas. The back of the fabric has a rubbery coating, making it slightly water resistant. Inner lining is a lighter green heavy upholstery material. This bag should take a beating!
Front features two large pockets that are embroidered with geometric shapes and lines in holographic and metallic thread. The pockets are made from the same heavy material as the lining of the bag.

Lift up the flap to reveal an inner pocket made from a section of wood grain printed oilcloth. Oilcloth pocket has a divider to seperate it into two pouches, one large and one small.

Main flap fastens closed with heavy duty, serious business 2" wide velcro. No jokin around, this things staying closed!

Main pouch is huge, carry everything with you everywhere you go.

Great for a busy day working where you want tools handy but hands free. Here in Richmond, our summers are so humid that wearing a messenger bag while you cycle can be a bit overwhelming in the summer. I love hip bags just for this reason...you can carry cameras and keep em handy, or go to the farmers market, or do other light shopping or adventuring without having to carry a messenger bag on your back. Those things just don't breathe, youknowwhati'msaying???

name: Dark Purple Canvas Hip Bag with Geometrically Topstitched Pockets
description:
I made this hip bag from a great, grape colored section of canvas. The front flap velcros with two vertical stripes of 2" wide, industrial velrco. The nice thing about the vertical placement is that you can fill the bag with huge items, then velcro the bag closed according to the size of what you're carrying.

It has two pink canvas pockets, stitched with asymmetrical geometric patterning in metallic threads, on the front and on the interior. 

The interior pocket is much larger, perfect for holding keys, wallet, phone, or whatever else you want to be able to access fast.

Great for working where you need your hands free, but need to carry tools that are kept accessible, but protected.

Features two belt loops on the back, run your belt through them or use with an exisiting messenger bag or fanny pack for additional hands free storage.

name: Butyl Bag, made from Flat Bicycle Innertubes
description:
These handy, zipper closure bags are made from dead bicycle tire innertubes from local bike shops and messengers. 

Each bag is slightly different, some have patches and some have printed logos from the innertube manufacturer.  

Each bag measures 5" tall and 8" wide.  Closes with a sturdy YKK zipper with a zipper pull of your choice.  

Perfect for cosmetics, tools, or anything else you want to carry with you in an enclosed container!

name: Geometric Roman Scroll cell phone holster, tool pouch
description:
Perfect small bag for traveling light. 
Holds a flat kit exactly. 
Attach to your messenger bag strap for fast cell phone, ipod, or camera access. 
Use as a saddle bag, handlebar bag, or frame bag on your bike or moped!
You can even just rock it on your belt if ya gotta!
Velcros shut with super strong 2" wide Velcro, back fastens to whatever you need with the same hook and loop.
Little tag reminds you to "live fast, ride slow"

Cardstock insert is exact size of iPhone 4s with no case on it. Huge cases, like otterbox or defender, most likely need the bigger cell phone holsters, but I can always check for you!

Measures approx 5" tall and 3.5" wide, has some width, about .5-1".

name: Midcentury inspired metallic olive cell phone holster
description:
Perfect small bag for traveling light. 
Holds a flat kit exactly. 
Attach to your messenger bag strap for fast cell phone, ipod, or camera access. 
Use as a saddle bag, handlebar bag, or frame bag on your bike or moped!
You can even just rock it on your belt if ya gotta!
Velcros shut with super strong 2" wide Velcro, back fastens to whatever you need with the same hook and loop.

Measures approx 5" tall and 3.5" wide, has some width, about .5-1".

description:

Measures approx 5" tall and 3.5" wide, has some width, about .5-1".

name: Zippered Tool Pouch with painted Silver Maple pull
description:
Made from heavy black canvas. Exterior screenprinted with geometric design. 

Zips closed with heavy duty YKK zipper, features a handpainted Silver Maple zipper pull.

Perfect for keeping your tools clean and confined when you travel by cycle.

name: Hells Satans Moped Club Cycling Cap
description:
Support your local moped club when you ride your bike!

Perfect for keeping sweat out of your eyes while you ride your bike to the Shred Shed to buy a part for your moped that just broke down.

Doubles as a welding cap, wearable under a helmet/ask so you can weld your exhaust bracket back on while keeping your luscious locks out of your face.

Black cotton panels are screen printed before assembly. Side panels are metallic peacock blue, front logo is bright pearl yellow.

Text from the roadkill opossum logo is screened under the brim in black pearl ink.

Stitched together with a bright pink thread.

Little tag in the back reminds you to "live fast, ride slow".

Pretty universal in size, if you have a tiny or huge head let me know in advance so you won't be bummed out, send me a measurement!

Cold water wash, tumble dry low but air dry is best.

name: High Vis Orange Pillow, printed with hand drawn dog portraits
description:
Recently my love of dogs was reaffirmed with the loss of a dear friends pet. I decided to draw portraits of some of my favorite canines and make fabric from the prints.

For this great statement pillow, I've silkscreened the portraits in Black Pearl ink on a bright Orange colored cotton. The front panels are backed by a second layer of white sateen (it just gives more opaqueness to the cotton), and the back panels are Black Cotton. A little internal tab of velcro secures the two overlapping back panels together.

Pillow case is removable and wash safe in cool water. Tumble dry low. 
Pillow insert is new, hypoallerginic poly fill. 
This listing is for one pillow (pillowcase and insert), measuring 18"x18".

name: Cream and Black Dog Portrait Pillows, 14" x 14"
description:
Recently my love of dogs was reaffirmed with the loss of a dear friends pet. I decided to draw portraits of some of my favorite canines and make fabric from the prints.

For this great statement pillow, I've silkscreened the portraits in Black Pearl ink on a Cream colored cotton. The front panels are backed by a second layer of Black cotton, and the back panels are Black Cotton. A little internal tab of velcro secures the two overlapping back panels together.

Pillow case is removable and wash safe in cool water. Tumble dry low. 
Pillow insert is new, hypoallerginic poly fill. 
This listing is for one pillow (pillowcase and insert), measuring 14"x14".

name: Eames Inspired Upholstery Fabric and Bike Tube Zippered Wallet
description:
What a perfect little clutch!

Outside is made from incredible, textural upholstery fabric. Inside has two credit card pockets made from recycled bicycle innertube. Zips closed to carry it all safely.

Works well as a wallet but doubles as a clutch when you want to carry minimal items.

Measures roughly 3.5" tall, is a little more than an inch thick, and is roughly 8" long.

name: Flat tube and upholstey fabric zippered wallet, red and gold lotus
description:
What a perfect little clutch!

Outside is made from incredible, textural upholstery fabric. Inside has two credit card pockets made from recycled bicycle innertube.  Zips closed to carry it all safely.

Works well as a wallet but doubles as a clutch when you want to carry minimal items.

Measures roughly 3.5" tall, is a little more than an inch thick, and is roughly 8" long.

name: Flat Innertube Zippered Clutch with geometric upholstery fabric
description: What a perfect little clutch! Outside is made from incredible, textural upholstery fabric. Side panels are made from recycled bike tube. Inside has two credit card pockets also made from recycled bicycle innertube. Zips closed to carry it all safely. Works well as a wallet but doubles as a clutch when you want to carry minimal items. Measures roughly 3.5" tall, is a little more than an inch thick, and is roughly 8" long. These will be for sale locally at Lamplighter Roasting Company on Saturday April 13th from 12pm-5pm, then available in the webstore afterward, listed individually. Many to choose from, each a little different!

name: Flat innertube and upholstery fabric zippered wallet, peacock colored half circles
description:
What a perfect little clutch!

Outside is made from incredible, textural upholstery fabric. Inside has two credit card pockets made from recycled bicycle innertube.  Zips closed to carry it all safely.

Works well as a wallet but doubles as a clutch when you want to carry minimal items.

Measures roughly 3.5" tall, is a little more than an inch thick, and is roughly 8" long.

name: Striped Satin and Gold Canvas Hip Bag
description:
This bag is so cheery and sweet.
The outer fabric is primarily gold canvas. Inside is lined with ice cream colored striped satin. Striping inside follows the striping of the outer front pocket and upper trip.
Inside is a green baja fabric pocket, shaped like a trapezoid.

Perfect for a day out in sunny weather.

Holds so much! Front pocket is divided into three sections, to keep things handy but separate.

This bag is quite a good size.
Measures:
L 13"
W 8"
and has room to expand outward of course.

name: Olive Green Canvas Hip Bag with Front Zippered Pocket
description:
This large hip bag has tons of storage places. 

Outer fabric is outdoor canvas in a lovely olive green. The fabric is coated on the back with a rubbery material, making it fairly water resistant. The inner material is a much lighter green heavy upholstery fabric.

The outer flap has a zippered pouch that is perfect for keeping things handy. Keys, wallet, phone, or whatever else you want quick access to.

The inside pocket is made from a wood grain printed oil cloth. Three stitched dividers provide seperate storage areas. The main pouch itself is huge and can fit all kinds of things. Perfect for a work day when you want the ability to use both hands but still carry tools with you.

name: Yellow Barkcloth Hip Bag
description:
What a lovely bag!

Outside is made from a bright pale yellow fabric. Top flap fastens with a large vintage lucite button. Exterior features a pocket made from polka dotted cotton material.
Interior pouch is quite large and is lined with the same polka dotted cotton, big enough to hold your essentials plus some. Features a small divided pocket for keeping some of your items seperate and handy. Interior pouch closes with a heavy duty zipper.

Two belt loops on the back make it easy to slide on your belt or onto a messenger bag/fanny pack for more storage on the go.

Measures 12.5" tall and 10" long

name: Navajo Print Waxed Cotton Hip Bag
description:
This bag has a little of it all.
Navajo printed waxed cotton exterior, with little hints of lavendar shimmering fabric here and there. Outer pockets are pleated purple fabric from Grandma's rainjacket. Well, one front pocket is pleated, the other is smooth. 

Inner pleated pouch is is also made from this same material. Bag is lined with gold canvas. Accented with electric lemon lime thread.

This bag is built to expand. Holds SO MUCH stuff! I packed a flat kit, snacks, a flashlight, camera and accessories and had room for so much more. Perfect for all kinds of adventures.

This bag is fairly large. Measures 14.5" long and 8" tall.

name: Hip Bag, Dark blue with dots
description:
This is a perfect small pack for rides and other adventures.

Outer fabric is a thickly woven, soft upholstery material.

Heavy duty velcro keeps the main flap securely closed. Belt loops on the back are spaced perfectly to carry your Mini U-Lock when riding.

Nylon Webbing belts are listed additionally in the shop in case you'd like a complete set shipped to you. See the last picture in the listing for photo example.

name: Hip Bag made from heavy raw canvas, modern blue geometric lining
description:
This is a perfect small pack for rides and other adventures.

Outer fabric is a thickly woven, soft upholstery material. 

Heavy duty velcro keeps the main flap securely closed. Belt loops on the back are spaced perfectly to carry your Mini U-Lock when riding.

Heavy Nylon Webbing belts are listed additionally in the shop in case you'd like a complete set shipped to you. See the last picture in the listing for photo example.

name: Quartz Crystal Necklace for Small Dogs
description:
For centuries, people have relied on natural elements for healing and strength.

Give your pup inspired powers with this Quartz Crystal Point necklace!

Quartz is a power stone. It has been called the "Universal Crystal" because of its many uses. It enhances energy by absorbing, storing, amplifying, balancing, focusing and transmitting. It channels universal energy. Quartz also enhances thoughts, as they are a form of energy. Because it directs and amplifies energy, it is extremely beneficial for manifesting, healing, meditation, protection, and channeling.

Made from welded link chain, this necklace is meant to hang loosely around your dogs neck as pictured. It should slip on and off over your pups head, no need for a clasp to tangle in his fur. 

The links of this chain are small, but large enough that short hairs do not get caught. It is secured with a snap ring that is pinched shut, but not soldered closed....better to lose a necklace than have your dog choke or get injured if he gets tangled!

Please send me a measurement of of your dogs neck around where a loose collar would hang.

This listing is for a necklace for a small dog. There is a small upcharge based on the length of chain needed for larger dogs. Send me a message if you have a dog over 30lbs and would like a necklace!

name: Antiqued Brass Chain Fringe and Quartz Crystal Necklace
description:
This statement piece is made from a small rolo chain in antiqued brass.  

Two angled sections of fringe give way to a pair of thin dangling quartz crystals.

Clear Quartz is known as the "master healer" and will amplify energy and thought, as well as the effect of other crystals.  It absorbs, stores, releases and regulates energy.  Clear Quartz draws off negative energy of all kinds, neutralising background radiation, including electromagnetic smog or petrochemical emanations.  It balances and revitalises the physical, mental, emotional and spiritual planes.  Cleanses and enhances the organs and subtle bodies and acts as a deep soul cleanser, connecting the physical dimension with the mind.  Clear Quartz enhances psychic abilities.  It aids concentration and unlocks memory.  Stimulates the immune system and brings the body into balance.

name: Simple, Modern Quartz Crystal Point Necklace with Turquoise Drop
description:
I love the aesthetic of a simple necklace. 

A single Quartz Crystal Point dangles from a medium length antiqued Brass chain.  Perfect for layering with other necklaces, or wearing as a daily stone.

A small triangular bead of Turquoise hangs from the neckline.

name: Double Terminated Quartz with Inclusions and Maple Necklace
description:
This statement necklace uses a piece of my favorite crystal stash...I love these little tiny double terminated pieces of Quartz Crystal!
Not sure what the inclusions are, but throughout the crystal you will see streaking and small black flecks.

Silver Maple branch is handpainted, hangs delicately above the crystal.

Antiqued Brass chain is quite long, allowing this necklace to lay below the busom but above the navel.

name: Silver Maple and Quartz Crystal Necklace
description:
This lovely long necklace was made from a beautiful piece of local Silver Maple tree. Bark shows some patterning, greenish splotches that occur naturally in Virginia.

Cut at an angle, then hand sanded to reveal beautiful grain. Back is flat. Quartz crystal point dangles right below the knot on the bark.

Tarnished brass chain is quite long, 32" to be exact. Lays approximately mid torso, just above the navel.

When laid flat, necklace measures 20" long. Maple is 2.5" long.

Quartz is a power stone. It has been called the "Universal Crystal" because of its many uses. It enhances energy by absorbing, storing, amplifying, balancing, focusing and transmitting. It channels universal energy. Quartz also enhances thoughts, as they are a form of energy. Because it directs and amplifies energy, it is extremely beneficial for manifesting, healing, meditation, protection, and channeling.

name: Long Necklace with Tigers Eye Cube and dangling Quartz Crystal
description:
This long statement necklace balances a beautiful large Tigers Eye cube atop a thin delicate Quartz Crystal Point.

Antiqued Brass chain is very long, this necklace rests below the busom but above the navel. Perfect for layering with other necklaces.

name: Painted Silver Maple Necklace
description:
This lovely necklace was made from silver maple branches, cut into short sections and hand painted.

The necklace is quite long, hanging to navel height. 
End to end, chain measures 37.5" long. 
Focal point of necklace is 4" long and 3" wide, roughly.

Shipped carefully from Virginia.
